intents.description: Account lifecycle tasks: login credentials, recovery, billing/profile updates, subscription management, deleting or restoring accounts.
Authentication and safety workflows: passwords, MFA/2FA, suspicious activity, biometric login, security alerts or remediation steps.
User-facing configuration and preferences: UI display, notifications, language, timezones, recovery contact details, profile personalization.
Compliance and data rights: exporting data, privacy policies, retention, data sharing or deletion requests.
Questions about how and where users can access the product, including supported platforms, apps, and browser compatibility.
Guidance on contacting support, escalation paths, and how to report bugs or technical problems.
Legal documentation and policy references such as terms of service, privacy policies, and related compliance pages.
Supported third-party integrations, connection steps, and configuration of external services.

unknown.description: Legitimate product or support question that does not yet fit the enumerated categories; use when truly novel topics are uncovered.

off_topic.description: Gibberish, chit-chat, or mismatched Q/A pairs that should be excluded from the knowledge base.
